name: Star Beluga
description:
HAPPY APRIL FOOL'S!!!

This is a small remake of STAR FOX in 2D made as a joke project.
May be developed into a full game.. so stay tuned ;)

Controls

  • Move: Use Left and Right arrow keys to move left and right.
  • Boost: Use Up arrow key to use boost.
  • Brake: Use Down arrow key to use brakes.
  • Bomb: Use X key to use a bomb.
  • Shoot: Use Z key to shoot.

Made with Godot
